Statements.Statement: SELECT date_format(str_to_date(ex.ExDate, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m-%d') AS ExDate, ex.`CurrCode`, ex.`CurrName`, ex.`CashBuy`, ex.`CashBuySpread`, ex.`CashSale`, ex.`CashSaleSpread`, ex.`RemitSend`, ex.`RemitRecv`, ex.`TCBuy`, ex.`Check`, ex.`BasicRate`, ex.`Commission`, ex.`Convert` FROM `soodal`.`tb_exchangerate` as ex WHERE ex.ExDate = @ExDate

SELECT ex.`ExDate`, ex.`CurrCode`, ex.`CurrName`, ex.`CashBuy`, ex.`CashBuySpread`, ex.`CashSale`, ex.`CashSaleSpread`, ex.`RemitSend`, ex.`RemitRecv`, ex.`TCBuy`, ex.`Check`, ex.`BasicRate`, ex.`Commission`, ex.`Convert` FROM `soodal`.`tb_exchangerate` as ex WHERE ex.ExDate = @ExDate AND ex.CurrCode = @CurrCode
